title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 10 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 10 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Blockbuster news -- Facing several allegations of sexual harassment Governor Andrew Cuomo resigns! Buck and Clay both say no one saw it coming -- even in the middle of the speech! What does the future hold for New York and Andrew Cuomo? Clay thinks he might be setting the table for a run in 2022; Buck would be surprised since NY AG Letitia James is probable opponent. Little lab coat tyrant, Fauci calls for national vaccine mandate.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
